page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Probably half the working population is involved in farm work of some kind or another,whilst the other half follow a variety of professions. There is a whinstone quarry and concrete pipe works just outside our block where about a dozen of our inhabitants work.There are three shops and a public house which employ a further eight people.Most other people travel outside the block to work;they include a sea-going engineer,a physiotherapist,an architect,six civil servants,a railway signalman,a plumber,a miner, the clerk of works at Acklington Prison,school_teachers and a variety of others.On the whole there is little permanent unemployment mainly due to the R.A.F.presence and successful farming.
